headline: CrowdStrike (CRWD) Valuation Check As Short Term Returns Cool And Long Term Gains Remain Strong
summary: CrowdStrike Holdings (CRWD) is back in focus after recent trading, with the stock last closing at US$453.88. headline: More AI means a higher need for cybersecurity: CrowdStrike CEO
summary: CrowdStrike Co-Founder and CEO George Kurtz sits down with Yahoo Finance Executive Editor Brian Sozzi on Opening Bid for a conversation about the concerns around AI chatbot deployment and the role cybersecurity will have as more tech companies invest in building out AI data center infrastructure. Also watch George Kurtz discuss CrowdStrike's latest streak of acquisitions. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid.

content.title: More AI means a higher need for cybersecurity: CrowdStrike CEO
content.description:
CrowdStrike Co-Founder and CEO George Kurtz sits down with Yahoo Finance Executive Editor Brian Sozzi on Opening Bid for a conversation about the concerns around AI chatbot deployment and the role cybersecurity will have as more tech companies invest in building out AI data center infrastructure.

Also watch George Kurtz discuss CrowdStrike's latest streak of acquisitions.

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid.
